data.name: The Exomachinist
data.detailed_description:
Only a few know about the one called The Exomachinist. Some of those who do and work for him, are involved in secret technologies which could endanger more than just Earth.
... Then there are the ones who are trying to stop him.

In this real-time strategy/action game you are sent with an experimantal starship to explore a mysterious planet where the secret hideout of the Exomachinist is being suspected.

FEATURES
  • Custom retro-style game engine with real-time lighting, particle-and physics effects.
  • Use your ship as a powerful weapons platform and to shield your squad from incoming enemy fire.
  • Build new weapons and upgrades in the ship's workshop using collected loot.
  • Expect to meet the Exomachinist's special creations when it comes to the boss battles.

ATTACK AND PROTECT
Targets can be attacked with your squad and your ship. Your squad can hide behind the ship for some protection. However, while strong, it won't last forever. Destroying enemies and special objects will leave loot behind which can be used to build new weapons and tech in the ship's workshop.


EXPLORING A MAP
During a mission your ship stays behind the map background and can move anywhere, while your squad moves around the given paths. This allows your ship to access areas your squad can't.

data.short_description: Explore a strange alien world in this real-time strategy/action game and fight the forces of the Exomachinist.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated or dedicated graphics hardware.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
